response.original_title: Gépmadár-avatás 2895-ben New York Cityben, ahogy az öreg Jules Verne elképzelte
response.overview: The Inauguration of a Mechanical Bird in 2895, in New York City. The 4-minute burlesque motion picture with silent picture-style intertitles mocks the naively utopian world of the Victorian age. The film was inspired by the bitter satires of the elderly Jules Verne, in which a distorting mirror is held up to American civilization
response.title: The Inauguration of a Mechanical Bird in 2895, in New York City
